page.title: 04The Surgery in Kimpton
page.content: The village of Kimpton is very fortunate in having its own doctors surgery. There are 6 doctors at the surgery working on a rota system.There are 4 rooms downstairs. These are the waiting room,doctor's room,reception area and dispensary,and a store room. There are 3 rooms upstairs including the health-visitor's room,examination room,and a waiting room/kitchen/store room.The house which the surgery now occupies was once where the district nurse lived. The hours during which the surgery is open are:Monday to Friday 9:00am - 12:00noon and Thursday 4:00pm-5:30pm. The surgery is allowed to dispense its own prescriptions for its patients The surrounding villages which also use the surgery are Peters Green, Breechwood Green,Bendish,Lilley and Whitwell.
